## Installation

You can install the released version of neonstore from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("neonstore")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cboettig/neonstore")
```
## Example

Download all CSV files in the bird survey data products.  This will omit downloads of any existing data files. 

```{r example}
library(neonstore)
neon_download("DP1.10003.001", file_regex = "[.]csv")

```


Now, view your library of NEON products:

```{r }
meta <- neon_index()
```
